The three main characters were already present in slightly different form in the unrelated, [[Flash Gordon]]-alike first full length [[comic strip]] by Jacobs, ''[[Le Rayon U]]'' (The 'U'-Ray, [[1943]]), where they appeared as Professor Marduk, Lord Calder, and Captain Dagon, respectively. (The story furnished many elements for ''L'Ãnigme de l'Atlantide'' as well.)
